content: if a bridge isn't worth it, you burn it down
sky full of stars that keep falling
the rose looks fair, but fairer we it deem / for that sweet odour, which doth in it live
if i'm a drama queen, then you're the king
i think i'm missing the point
i like being alone, but i don't like being lonely
i could drink the river dry and still die of thirst
they may be tall but don't stack up to me
the line between Light and Dark is so very thin. do you know which side you're on?
when we lose our principles, we invite chaos
we're all living in each other's paranoia
even paradise becomes a prison if you can't leave
voice our anger on our phones, but in real life, we're quiet
i'm fallin apart, did i really start that trend?
through all the power trips, the cowardice, the pleasure, and pain / i found that me, God, and the Devil are all one and the same
why you actin like you my friend? you know nothin about me
and you're 2000 miles away / so why am i stalking your Twitter and lying awake?
but despite all the lies and projections, i hope you're okay
cause my whole personality's fake / and i want someone else in my place
an endeavor to die or create
i spent all my serotonin on you
i hope you're happy, but not like how you were with me
